entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:16 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -15.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
